Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place
Review Text: Nice cozy coffeeshop with friendly staff. We really enjoyed the weed we took there :)

Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place
Review Text: Tasty and strong weed(mako's haze), firefly budtender, good vibe, and nice customers. Didn't know about this shop until I rode by and thought I'd get half a gram. Not disappointed, very nice shop

Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place
Review Text: Loved this place . It is really a NICE PLACE, a nice spot to go. Found this randomly and it was the best thing that happened. Very good people, very friendly, good hearted owner. And I highly recommend. Obviously I will return. When in Amsterdam. Big love from Portugal ‚ù§üîùüîù

Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place
Review Text: Nice quiet place with a homely feel, vibe is friendly and the staff more than happy to chat. Weed quality is average for Amsterdam but that's not the reason why you want to come here, it provides a nice escape from the hustle and a great ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place
Review Text: Excellent service and well priced dope. Hot coffee and some really nice strains to try out. Hash is worth a try, especially the Moroccan stuff! Top 3 places for sure, guy behind the counter is a top bloke.

Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place
Review Text: Nice place is a great name that shouts out the nice staff. Good prices, good quality and a wide range of drinks. Fella at the bar has some great customer service. They have a little internet cafe part which is something I haven't seen in other places.

Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place
Review Text: We're visiting from Canada and loved this place. Calm, comfortable atmosphere, and good quality product. Bartender is very nice as well and spoke perfect english.

Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place
Review Text:

Nice weed & hash, good prices and the pre-rolled are discounted if you buy 5. Guys that work there are chill and speak multiple languages. üèÖ

Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place
Review Text: Best place in Amsterdam. Not full, and the owner who usually works there is the best. One night he played Bob Marley and everything was fine.

Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place
Review Text: Very friendly staff, products you cannot complain about, and a really nice local atmosphere. Plus, there's a lovely cat there who loves a bit of fuss üôÇ

Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place

Review Text:

Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place
Review Text: This one is truely the best "Buurtshop" in Amsterdam. The atmosphere is as nice as the staff is. The prices are really good, and the menue is great! The "Nice Special* is one of the best strains We've ever tried! Go there and enjoy!

Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place
Review Text: Nice and cozy Place, good Weed, fair prices, friendly staff and also a cool cat.

Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place
Review Text: Love coming here for some really nice product! Also love how the dude behind the counter treats everyone. He is very helpful and so so polite! Highly reccomend !

Name: Coffeeshop Nice Place
Review Text: Great coffeeshop, good prices and even better weed. Great place to have a sit down and chill with a nice cup of tea or some soda.

Review Text: Cool coffee shop, this was our 1st stop when we got to dam. Right next to our apartment nipped here 1st. Decent little shop with some decent peng.

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Located across from a lovely park in the great The Pipe district, this coffee shop opens early and the staff were very welcoming. (The Moroccan Hospitality is much less cold than the Dutch one.) We spent hours there ‚Ä¶
